publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3688 Mr Frank McAveety: Support for the Govanhill Baths Trust—That the Parliament welcomes the development of the business plan by Govanhill Baths Trust in response to the future use of the former Calder Street Baths site in Govanhill, Glasgow; acknowledges the spirit and commitment of the community and volunteers in putting together their business plan along with the professional advice of Nord Architecture; recognises that the health and wellbeing centre proposed would be of major benefit not just to the Govanhill area but also the wider southside of Glasgow; calls on all possible funding agencies to consider the business plan in a positive way, and further calls on the Scottish Government to consider the business plan as an application that is of merit and to consider providing exceptional funding to the Govanhill Baths Trust through end-year flexibility funding.
